thread.section_title: Constant Contact Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Constant Contact | www.constantcontact.com
thread.title: Della Booth
thread.title_full: Constant Contact reviewed by Della Booth

author: Della Booth
title: Della Booth
text:
Constant Contact,
We have been together for several years. You have always been there with support and encouragement when I needed you the most. You have proved to be a giver and not just a taker in our relationship.
Happy Anniversary!
In all seriousness, I appreciate the ease in which I am able to create my newsletters and promotions to my community.
Della Booth, Broker/Owner
TIME Realty Services, Inc.
